Text: The so called moonlanding with Armstrong was recorded in a studio in US. Because they were scared that the Russians would get there first
knaster ur wrong, everyone who thinks we didnt really go to the moon is a fucking retard.
well then i guess im a retard. Although i now im right

After you seen the movie check this out...

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Apollo_Moon_Landing_hoax_accusations

I'm hugely skeptical by nature but the Apollo Missions aren't one of my doubts.  I'm sure there is PLENTY of dirt there as is always the case in massive government programs (read MONEY/CORRUPTION).  Complete mission fakery is just not factually correct.  It doesn't take long while reading through some of the nay sayers' comments (not here, of course) that they've based their conclusions and proofs on things they know nothing about.  Some fall into the category of ridiculous.
Hmm... Well this is actualy quite interesting, I still think we landed on the moon but this is a much better conspiracy than the laugh I thought this was going to give me. have a look for yourself.
Here is a web page that refutes the alleged evidence that the moon landing was a hoax: http://www.braeunig.us/space/hoax.htm. You should check it out if you doubt the moon landing took place.
